title: [Fakta atau Hoaks] Benarkah Ada Susu Berbahan Kimia dari Cina yang Beredar di Indonesia?
subtitle: [Fakta atau Hoaks] Benarkah Ada Susu Berbahan Kimia dari Cina yang Beredar di Indonesia?
author: cekfakta.tempo.co
vclaim: Akun Yasmeen menulis: “As per WHO Pakistani produces 14 crore litres of Milk and sells around 50 + crores litres of Milk. They say Pakistanais are drinking poision and not Milk.. due to such huge adulteration 87% of population in Pakistani could suffer from Cancer”
